title: Effective Trailer Whooshes
description: One-shot whooshing transitions with aggressive sweeps, angry and sudden drops, big heart-stopping bass, bone-chilling metallic textures, frantic reveals, glitchy futuristic flybys, dramatic and disturbing movements, and epic cinematic openings.
longDescription:
Federico Soler Fernandez is the sound designer behind the new Effective Trailer libraries, a set of trailer sample packs aimed at providing state of the art sounds for the modern cinematic composer.Â 


PACK PREVIEW


As a composer himself, his music has been featured in promotional campaigns for the movie "Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets" - "Middle Earth: Shadow of War" the mobile game - "Halloween (2018)" - "The Predator (2018)".
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Each piece of sound design features five different lengths (A, B, C, D, and E) each with its own unique flavor and stylistic approach which allows the user to cover a wider range of professional work by adapting his/her favorite samples to the needs of a particular project.
  • Also, since each file version was created using the tempo (120 BPM), all C files, for example, will hit at the same point in the grid, making your samples easier to position in your project and quicker to audition and replace when AB testing different sound choices.

Number of Audio Waves: 320

Number of Audio Cues: 320

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX Loop: No

Minutes of Audio Provided: 32
